page.title: 14LIFESTYLES IN NORTH BRENT
page.content: {Kenton} is a very pleasant area with a lot of open spaces. Most of the { {houses} are semi-detached and were built in the 1930's.There are two shopping areas both of which are clean and pleasant. The {appliances} which we have in our homes add to our lifestyle. We have a variety of electrical appliances, including washing mmachines (automatic), tumble dryers, dishwashers, microwave ovens, videa records and computers, television and radio. The majority of people have at least one car sometimees more which help them with their jobs. A lot of people's lifestyles are ruled by the { {television} but we are encouraged to join clubs and to meet new people. We often go to the cinema, theatre and concerts.We also go on holiday every year, usually abroad.
